name: Be Prepared!
description:
"There is no war. There is no violence. The only thing that is real, is the matter of survival."

Be Prepared, a relaxed village builder game, is currently in development. Players can only  gather resources and construct a few type of buildings.

Features
  • Improvement System: Improve  villagers productivity.
  • Save/Load: Fully serialized game.
  • Procedural World Generation.
Future Plans
  • Implementing a yearly resource expense for village needs.
  • Implementing a moral system that affects villagers productivity.
Controls
  • Movement: W/A/S/D or scroll with middle mouse button.
  • Rotation: Q/E to rotate.
  • Villager Controls: Select with left mouse button, give orders with right mouse button.
  • Select a unit to build then build with left click, cancel with right click.
